item.description:
Take a break from the stress of holiday shopping to discuss "The Secret Life of Bees" by Sue Monk Kidd. Please bring (or email me) a list of books you would like to read at future meetups. First meetup will be held at French Press (near BC) - T- accessible on the B line- last stop literally drops you off at the front door of the coffee shop. Come enjoy your favorite beverage and/or afternoon snack with new friends discussing one of your favorite things-BOOKS!



UPDATED 12/3: French Press is a nice but small cafe- I will arrive early to try to reserve us a spot. However, if there is no room or if you arrive past 3pm and can't find us please walk up the street (two or three shops up from the T-towards Newton) and find us at another shop White Mountain Creamery. Thanks- Looking forward to meeting you and having a great discussion.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: December gathering
